The World Jigsaw Puzzle Championships is an annual international speed puzzling competition where individuals, pairs, and teams race to complete puzzles as fast as possible.

Read more about it [here](https://www.worldjigsawpuzzle.org/)

![Homepage of the dashboard](images/wjpc-dash.png)

For this hobby project, I retrieved the results from the World Jigsaw Puzzle Federation's (WJPF) website and visualized it using a quarto dashboard.
